lines.i: For reports on mothers and their fetus(es), information on a mother is mapped to recordTarget, PatientRole, and Patient. Information on the fetus is mapped to subject, relatedSubject, and SubjectPerson at the CDA section level. Both context information on the mother and fetus must be included in the document if observations on fetus(es) are contained in the document.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:9189, CONF:10535 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.3"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="121026" (CodeSystem: 1.2.840.10008.2.16.4 DCM)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] subject (CONF:9191)
This subject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:9192)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="121026" (CodeSystem: 1.2.840.10008.2.16.4 DCM)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] subject (CONF:9191)
This subject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:9192)

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <relatedsubject xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.3"/> <code code="121026" codeSystem="1.2.840.10008.2.16.4" codeSystemName="DCM"/> <subject> <name/> </subject> </relatedsubject>
